Params: {1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront32.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.9', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1165.jpg'}
{3: 'Eleanor pulls over another chair from nearby and sits down.'}
{3: 'She picks up the wristband terminal for the game.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Eleanor', 3: 'No one seems to be initiating this round yet.', 4: '1', 18: '100007558'}
{2: "Probably won't for a while yet.", 3: '9'}
{3: 'Eleanor looks at you with great interest.'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "If I were your opponent, I'd drag out the game too.", 4: '1', 18: '100007560'}
{2: 'Hold out for an hour.', 3: '14', 4: 'Hmm?', 5: '14'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "You're thinking the same thing, aren't you?", 4: '1', 18: '100007561'}
{3: 'Eleanor chuckles.'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: 'I thought that was part of your strategy...', 4: '1', 18: '100007562'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "By just hunkering down in a safe zone, you can prolong your opponent's torment.", 4: '1', 18: '100007563'}
{3: 'In a cage without the concept of time, everyone would lose their grip on time.'}
{3: 'Control over sleep and the body blurs as the hours stretch and collapse.'}
{3: 'An hour was supposed to be for rest—or to rethink the next move. But as the game wore on, it twisted into something else: another thread woven into the nightmare.'}
{2: 'This must be the effect the designers intended.', 3: '24'}
{3: 'The word "Filtering" surfaces in your mind.'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "I couldn't agree more.", 4: '1', 18: '100007564'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: 'Speaking of which, now, do we have a chance to spend the rest of our time together?', 4: '1', 18: '100007565'}
{3: 'Eleanor moves to sit closer to you.'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "Aren't you even a little curious about all this?", 4: '1', 18: '100007566'}
{2: 'Not as much as my curiosity about you.', 3: '32'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: 'Me? Just a bird trying to break free from its cage, chasing after freedom.', 4: '1', 18: '100007567'}
{3: 'Eleanor points toward the sky, her words pulling you back to the train of thought you had just lost.'}
{3: 'She flicks the cards from the table between her fingers, sending them spinning through the air before they return to her hand.'}
{2: 'May I take a look at your terminal?', 3: '36'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: 'In principle, I should say no.', 4: '1', 18: '100007568'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: 'But... alright, as a trade, indulge my curiosity about you, too?', 4: '1', 18: '100007569'}
{2: "Compared to your situation... there's only a slight difference.", 3: '42', 4: 'I just came alone to search for supplies and got separated from my companions.', 5: '42'}
{3: 'Eleanor tosses the terminal to you—clearly unconcerned about your injuries.'}
{2: '(Examine the terminal once more)', 3: '50'}
{3: 'Your fingers trace the metal frame, brushing over the words about freedom etched along its edges.'}
{3: 'The woman takes the terminal and places it back on the table.'}
{2: '(Walk toward the sofa in the room)', 3: '54'}
{3: 'You lean back into the sofa, carefully avoiding any contact with the wounds.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'The painkillers finally kick in—yelids leaden, thoughts turning syrupy slow.'}
{3: "In the last flicker of wakefulness, Eleanor's fingers brush your shoulder as she smooths the blanket over you."}
